page.title: 05EDUCATION PAISLEY
page.content: {Sacred Heart High School}was opened in 1971 and is a{fully comprehensive {secondary school}with a capacity for 1290 pupils from S.1 to S.6. At present the school roll is falling and its roll in session 1984-1985 was 677 pupils. Its projected roll for 1985-1986 is 647. The school offers a full range of subjects though under recently introduced arrangements senior pupils following courses in certain subjects travel to other schools within a{consortium}of which this school is a member. The school has{an attached community {wing}which is used by local residents for a wide range of activities. These include organised clubs which can use the school Games Hall,for sporting activities such as 5 a side football, badminton,netball.
